pages.text: Occultism is a mod based on making rituals to summon spirits to do your bidding into an object form or as living entitiies - some of which may not like you.

Break grass to find Demon's Dream Seeds. Plant and grow them into fruit. Burn the fruit on a log to make spirit fire & toss in certain items to make your starting materials. Check the Dictionary of Spirits for more!
You can make minions to automate some tasks, magic lamps to auto-mine for you in a dimensional mineshaft, and you can make remote access crafting & storage from any dimension!
